Package org.group7.model.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
org.group7.model.board.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMoveHandler, PieceExtractor, IBasePowerUpHandler, ILaserPowerUpHandler, ILightningPowerUpHandler
public class Board extends Object implements IMoveHandler, PieceExtractor, IBasePowerUpHandler, ILightningPowerUpHandler, ILaserPowerUpHandler
The Board class represents the game board.

      steps - The parameter "steps" is of type int, which represents the number of steps the piece should take.

    • removeEntitiesFromField

      public void removeEntitiesFromField(int pos, int amountTiles)
      The function removes all entities from a field starting from a given position and iterates through the field in a circular manner for 8 tiles.
      Specified by:
      removeEntitiesFromField in interface ILaserPowerUpHandler
      Parameters:
      pos - The `pos` parameter represents the starting position from where entities will be removed.
      amountTiles - The`amountTiles` parameter represents the number of tiles to iterate through.

    • extractPieceFromBase

      public Piece extractPieceFromBase(Color baseColor)
      Removes and returns a piece from its base.
      Parameters:
      baseColor - represents the color of the base from which we want to extract a piece.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a Piece object.

    • pieceFromBaseToField

      public void pieceFromBaseToField(Color c, int diceRoll)
      The function moves a piece from a specific base (based on the color) to the field using the dice roll.
      Specified by:
      pieceFromBaseToField in interface IBasePowerUpHandler
      Parameters:
      c - The color of the player's pieces (e.g., Color.RED or Color.BLUE).
      diceRoll - The diceRoll parameter represents the number rolled on a die. It is used to determine the destination field for the piece being moved from the base.

    • pieceFromGoalStretchToField

      public void pieceFromGoalStretchToField(Piece p)
      The function takes a piece and moves it from the goal stretch to the field, updating its position and state.
      Specified by:
      pieceFromGoalStretchToField in interface PieceExtractor
      Parameters:
      p - The parameter "p" is of type "Piece".

    • completedLap

      private boolean completedLap(int prevPos, int nextPos, int start)
      The function checks if a lap has been completed based on the previous and next positions of a player and the starting position.
      Parameters:
      prevPos - The previous position of the selected piece.
      nextPos - The next position of the selected piece.
      start - Represents the starting tile for the player who owns the piece.
      Returns:
      The method returns a boolean value representing whether the piece has completed a lap of the board.

    • movePieceInGoalStretch

      Parameters:
      piece - The parameter "piece" is of type Piece, which represents a game piece.
      steps - The parameter "steps" is of type int, which represents the number of steps the piece should take.

    • getPieceAmount

      The function returns the number of pieces of a specific color.
      Parameters:
